The Kennedy Center is a 501: c)(3) tax-exempt organization, which means it is prohibited from making political donations or participating in political activity.
The Kennedy Center has never donated to: according to Brendan Padgett, a spokesperson for the Kennedy Center.
The Kennedy Center received: 25 million as part of the CARES Act stimulus package, which was designated for specific purposes such as employee compensation, grants, contracts, and administrative expenses.
